mash.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to crush something, especially a food that has been cooked, until it is soft and smooth
mash.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: potatoes that have been boiled and then crushed and mixed with milk until they are smooth
mash.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a mixture of malt or crushed grain and hot water, used to make beer or whisky
mash.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: a mixture of grain cooked with water to make a food for animals
mash.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a very popular US television programme(1972–82), based on Robert Altman’s film of the same name (1970) about a US army medical camp during the  Korean War.
